product_name: Central Montana Rock: Climbs Around Helena, Canyon Ferry and The Rocky Mountain Front
long_description: This area of serene crags is home to everything from convenient practice areas to some of the most challenging free climbs in the state. Author: Jake Mergenthaler. Softcover; 186 pages; black-and-white photos and route overlays. First Ascent Press; copyright 2006. Covers over 350 quality climbs on roadside sport crags, lonely canyons, textured spires and multi-pitch wonders.
short_description: This area of serene crags is home to everything from convenient practice areas to some of the most challenging free climbs in the state.
